summary: An ordinance relating to the Water Department, accepting bills of sale from A. R. Anderson and H. J. Johnson of certain watermains in West 191st Street between First Avenue Northwest and Third Avenue Northwest; in Second Avenue Northwest between West 191st and West 193rd Streets; and in North 196th Place between Wallingford Ave. and a point 385 feet M/L west thereof; and making appropriation from the Water Fund therefor.
